title: Crypto Ui
description: This project is a crypto UI design that is created using Chakra UI, and Axios is used to fetch data from a REST API

title: TechyStar UI
description: The TechyStar web UI design has been created to improve learning efficiency, and Sass has been used for styling

title: BBC Ui
description: The BBC News website UI clone was created using HTML, CSS, and the framework Bootstrap .
